page.title: 19Employment,Communications.
page.content: EMPLOYMENT. Employment in this area is mainly bound up with agriculture.There is an agricultural contractor,a Fertilizer salesman,agricultural labourers,self_employed tenant farmers,and an agricultural engineer. Others in the area commute to the city and are teachers,air stewards,doctors and bank clerks.There is also a Buillder and two unemployed men.Labour relations are generally good as most people are self_employed. COMMUNICATIONS. There are two Postboxes and no Telephone boxes. ATTITUDES. The population in general are pleased that one time derelict buildings are being sympathetically converted into dwellings,which is helping to stabalise the population.
